SEARCH
Package org.wmn4j.io.musicxml

Interface MusicXmlReader

All Superinterfaces:
AutoCloseable, Closeable, ScoreReader
public interface MusicXmlReader extends ScoreReader
Represents a reader for MusicXML files.

Implementations of this interface are not guaranteed to be thread-safe.

  • Method Details

    • readerFor

      static MusicXmlReader readerFor(Path path)
      Returns a reader for the MusicXML file at the given path. The MusicXML file is validated against the schema. Accepted file extensions are .xml, .musicxml, and .mxl (for compressed MusicXML). The input MusicXML is validated against version 4.0 schema, which should accept also earlier versions of MusicXML. Only part-wise scores are currently supported.
      Parameters:
      path - the path of the file for which this reader is created
      Returns:
      a reader for the MusicXML file at the given path

    • nonValidatingReaderFor

      static MusicXmlReader nonValidatingReaderFor(Path path)
      Returns a reader for the MusicXML file at the given path that does not validate the input against MusicXML schema.
      Parameters:
      path - the path of the file for which this reader is created
      Returns:
      a reader for the MusicXML file at the given path that skips validation
